content: I remember that moment vividly. Odyl leaned in close, her breath hot against my ear as she whispered "good girl" and called me Dearie. It was all part of a ruse, but in that moment, it felt so real. I hadn't anticipated how it would make me feel, and it set the tone for our flirtation and connection for years to come. From that moment on, I found myself drawn to her in ways I couldn't explain, and even though we were often at odds as adversaries in the field, there was always an underlying tension between us that we both felt.
